description: As a user I want to be able to press the button "Enter the cafe" and get tree new alternatives to choose from.

elements.name: Button to enter the cafe

steps.name: that the user on the web page "http://localhost:3000"
the user clicks on the button "Enter the cafe"
the user should get two new aternatives to choose from: "Exit the cafe" and "Buy an espresso"

name: Enter the cafe

description: As a user I should be able to play in full screen mode.

elements.name: Full screen mode

steps.name: that the user is on the game page "http://localhost:3000"
the user clicks on the "Full screen" icon
the user should be able to play in full screen mode "true"

name: Full screen mode

description: As a user I should be able to see the status bar for the health and see how it changes when I interact with the game.

elements.name: Health status bar

steps.name: that the user is on the first page "http://localhost:3000"
the user interacts by clicking on the "Wait" button on the page
the "Health" condition should go down to 45

description: As a user I should be able to click on the help button to get information and rules about the game.

elements.name: Help button

steps.name: that the user is on the game site "http://localhost:3000"
the user clicks on the "Help" button
it should display a text with information and rules about the game

name: Help button

description: As a user I should be able to click on the wait button to interact with the game.

elements.name: Wait button

steps.name: that the user is on the page "http://localhost:3000"
the user clicks on the "Wait" button
the user should be able to interact with the game by various directives that appear on the screen

name: Wait button

description: As a user I want to be able to get double espressos as a reward for helping the barista with exporting a beer in the hipster bag.

elements.name: Hipster bag and double espresso

steps.name: that the user is on the homepage "http://localhost:3000"
the user helps the barista with exporting a beer
the user should be able to put it in their hipster bag
the user should receive double espressos from the barista as a reward

name: Double espressos as a reward

description: As a user I should be able to lose the game.

elements.name: Lose the game

steps.name: that the user is on the main page "http://localhost:3000"
the user clicks on the "Wait" button 7 times
the game should end and the user should see a game over screen

name: Game over

description: As a user I want to win the game by obtaining 5 cups of espresso (based on my empirical knowledge about how to win the game).

elements.name: At the right place with the right starting values

steps.name: that I have started the game by navigating to "http://localhost:3000"
that my position is "outside the cafe"
the value of my "Health" should be 50
the value of my "Money" should be 10
the value of my "Espressos" should be 0
my hipster bag should contain "nothing cool"

elements.name: I navigate from outside the cafe to a crowded bar

steps.name: that my position is "outside the cafe"
that I make the choice to "Go north"
that I make the choice to "Go east"
the value of my "Health" should be 50
the value of my "Money" should be 10
the value of my "Espressos" should be 0
my hipster bag should contain "nothing cool"
my position should be "in a crowded bar"

elements.name: I stay at the crowded bar and wait for the bartender to give me a beer

steps.name: that my position is "in a crowded bar"
that I know my current health
I wait for the event "The bartender offers you a can of beer for free" to take place
my health should be "less or same as before"
the value of my "Money" should be 10
the value of my "Espressos" should be 0
my hipster bag should contain "a can of beer"

name: Win the game
